verbs.description: [ARG0: Roger Stone , a longtime associate of President Donald Trump ,] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Sunday] [ARGM-LOC: on NBC 's " Meet the Press "] [ARG1: that he is prepared to be indicted by special counsel Robert Mueller , " should that be the case] . "
